name: KAUSHALYA Foundation
briefDescription: We are working with more than 23000 smallholders and the poor addressing the regressive issues pertaining to their livelihoods, agriculture, education, gender-relations, health, hygiene, nutrition, climate change adaptability and environmental-solidarity. We focus our efforts in these areas:Development programs1) We work with the underprivileged communities on long-term area approach to eradicate poverty and inequity through creating new opportunities for them..2) We promote sustainable micro- enterprises in environment friendly manner3) We impart knowledge and ensure sustainability through training, capacity building and organizing the poor in their own institutions collaborating with Government & Private bodies.
